title: Ranjan admitted to Colombo National Hospital
body_lines: Former Parliamentarian Ranjan Ramanayake, who was receiving treatment at the Welikada Prison Hospital was admitted to the Colombo National Hospital today.
Prisons Spokesman Chandana Ekanayake said the actor-turned politician was taken to the Orthopaedic Clinic of the National Hospital from the Prison Hospital and was admitted for further treatment.

Earlier, Mr. Ramanayake had also undergone treatment at the Karapitiya General Hospital for a knee injury and the doctors at the hospital directed Mr. Ramanayake to be admitted to the Orthopaedic Clinic of the NHC.(Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
